lt.vtmc.files.controller

Class FilesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lt.vtmc.files.controller.FilesController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(value="*",
             exposedHeaders="Content-Disposition")
public class FilesController
extends Object
    Rest controller for downloading and uploading files.
    Author:
    pra-va

      • uploadFiles

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(value="/api/file")
public void uploadFiles(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                                                                                    Document doc)
        API method that accepts single multipart file and calls service layer method for this file to be preserved on database.
        Parameters:
        file - to be uploaded
        doc - owner of file

      • downloadFileByFileName

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(value="/api/files/{fileUID}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadFileByFileName(@PathVariable(value="fileUID")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  String fileUID)
        This API method will return a downloadable file by file name.
        Parameters:
        fileUID - parameter to be used in search for files
        Returns:
        response entity with file

      • downloadFiles

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(value="/api/files/zip/{username}",
            produces="application/zip")
public byte[] downloadFiles(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                               String username)
        Creates a .zip file containing all files the user has created
        Parameters:
        response - of servlet
        username - owner of files that will be downloaded by zip file
        Returns:
        byte array of zip file

      • downloadCSV

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(value="/api/files/csv/{username}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadCSV(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                            String username)
        Returns csv file of users files and documents.
        Parameters:
        username - of which csv file should be formed
        Returns:
        response entity with resourse of csv file

      • deleteFileByUID

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @DeleteMapping(path="/api/files/delete/{UID}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteFileByUID(@PathVariable(value="UID")
                                                                                                                                                                  String UID)
        Deletes a file from the system
        Parameters:
        UID - of file to be deleted
        Returns:
        response entity of delete status
